feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 26, 22:00 UTC  -  Apr 27, 04:00 UTC

Apr 6, 23:28 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/04/2023 22:00 UTC
End time : 27/04/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [SBG3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network & servers operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 11, 22:00 UTC  -  Apr 12, 04:00 UTC

Mar 27, 20:35 UTC
Update - Below you can find the new dates of the current maintenance.

Start time : 11/04/2023 22:00 UTC
End time : 12/04/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby. Once the update is complete, a switchover will be performed to update the remaining devices. Expect a few seconds freeze of the inputs/outputs during the switchover
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Mar 24, 22:37 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/03/2023 22:00 UTC
End time : 30/03/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby. Once the update is complete, a switchover will be performed to update the remaining devices. Expect a few seconds freeze of the inputs/outputs during the switchover
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and and ESXi upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 11, 06:00 UTC  -  Apr 14, 16:00 UTC

Apr 5, 14:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/04/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 14/04/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere and Zerto will be inaccessible for 3 hours during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service

entry.title: [RBX2B][Storage] - tete-3185
entry.content:
Mar 31, 11:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 31/03/2023 06:29 UTC
End Time : 31/03/2023 08:26 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2B
Root cause : Incident caused by a hardware module failure.

Mar 31, 08:26 UTC
Monitoring - Start time: 31/03/2023 06:29 UTC
User impact : Storage services are available for all our clients.
Ongoin Actions: All services are operational, we keep this incident under monitoring for 2 hours
Root cause : Incident caused by a hardware module failure.
Ongoing actions : All services are operational again, however we keep this incident under observation for 2 hours.

Mar 31, 08:19 UTC
Identified - Start time: 31/03/2023 06:29 UTC
User impact : Storage services are unavailable for the following clients: pcc-002131 / pcc-005153
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2B
Root cause : Incident caused by a hardware module failure.
Ongoing actions :A replacement of the affected module is in progress.

Mar 31, 06:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 31/03/2023 06:29 UTC
User impact : Storage services are unavailable for the following clients: pcc-002131 / pcc-005153
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2B
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
